de.jannlab.generator

Class LSTMGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.jannlab.generator.LSTMGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetGenerator

    public class LSTMGenerator
extends Object
implements NetGenerator
    This class provides macro methods to easy setup LSTM networks. The class uses the NetCoreGenerator internal.

    Author:
    Sebastian Otte
    See Also:
    NetCoreGenerator

      • hiddenLayer

        public int hiddenLayer(int blocksnum,
              CellType gates,
              CellType netin,
              CellType states,
              boolean peepholes)
        Adds a hidden layer to the current model with n LSTM blocks.

        Parameters:
        blocksnum - Number of LSTM blocks
        gates - CellType of the gates.
        netin - CellType of cell-input.
        states - CellType of cell-outpt.
        peepholes - Use peepholes?
        Returns:
        Layer index.

        Parameters:
        num - Number of hidden neurons.
        Returns:
        Layer index.

      • outputLayer

        public int outputLayer(int num,
              CellType type)

        Parameters:
        num - Number if hidden neurons.
        type - Instance of CellType.
        Returns:
        Layer index.

      • outputLayer

        public int outputLayer(int num,
              CellType type,
              boolean usebias,
              double bias)
        Adds a output layer to the current model of given cell type with bias support.
        Parameters:
        num - Number if hidden neurons.
        type - Instance of CellType.
        usebias - True if bias sould be used.
        bias - Value of the bias.
        Returns:
        Layer index.

      • hiddenLayer

        public static int hiddenLayer(NetCoreGenerator gen,
              int blocksnum,
              CellType gates,
              CellType netin,
              CellType netout,
              boolean peepholes)
        Creates a hidden layer with n LSTM blocks.

        Parameters:
        gen - Instance of NetCoreGenerator.
        blocksnum - Number of LSTM blocks
        gates - CellType of the gates.
        netin - CellType of cell-input.
        netout - CellType of cell-output.
        peepholes - Use peepholes?
        Returns:
        Layer index.

      • hiddenLayer

        public static int hiddenLayer(NetCoreGenerator gen,
              int blocksnum,
              CellType gates,
              CellType netin,
              CellType netout,
              boolean peepholes,
              boolean usegatesbias,
              double gatesbias,
              boolean useinputbias,
              double inputbias,
              boolean useoutputbias,
              double outputbias)
        Creates a hidden layer with n LSTM blocks.

        Parameters:
        gen - Instance of NetCoreGenerator.
        blocksnum - Number of LSTM blocks
        gates - CellType of the gates.
        netin - CellType of cell-input.
        netout - CellType of cell-output.
        peepholes - Use peepholes?
        usegatesbias - Add bias to the gates?
        gatesbias - The bias value for the gates.
        useinputbias - Add bias to input?
        inputbias - The bias value for the input.
        Returns:
        Layer index.

      • outputLayer

        public static int outputLayer(NetCoreGenerator gen,
              int num,
              CellType type)
        Creates a output layer with the given NetCoreGenerator with bias support.
        Parameters:
        gen - Instance of NetCoreGenerator.
        num - Number of input neurons.
        type - Instance of CellType.
        Returns:
        Layer index.

      • outputLayer

        public static int outputLayer(NetCoreGenerator gen,
              int num,
              CellType type,
              boolean usebias,
              double bias)
        Creates a output layer with the given NetCoreGenerator with bias support.
        Parameters:
        gen - Instance of NetCoreGenerator.
        num - Number of input neurons.
        type - Instance of CellType.
        usebias - Enable a bias neuron for this layer.
        bias - Gives the value for the bias neuron.
        Returns:
        Layer index.
